explains: n. 贪污，腐败；堕落，腐蚀；（电脑上资讯的）破坏，损坏；（语言）变体；<古>腐坏，腐烂
wordGroup: combat corruption 反腐；惩治腐败
crime of corruption 贪污罪；腐化罪
fighting corruption 对抗贪污；打击贪污

sentences.en: Corruption is endemic in the system.
sentences.cn: 腐败在这种制度下普遍存在。

sentences.en: Here was corruption on a grand scale.
sentences.cn: 这里的腐败现象曾十分严重。

sentences.en: It is a country where corruption is rife.
sentences.cn: 这是个腐败成风的国家。
